resources.string:
Vegetarian
A number of curated Vegetarian plans to keep fit while sticking to your diet

Plan A
A balanced approach for beginners to increase overall fitness with a focus on building up cardio and light bodybuildng.

Plan B Aerobics High Intensive
Contains a variety of intensive workouts for those who wish to stretch their cardio to the limits over a short period of time

Plan C Strength Training
A set of workouts and exercises designed to improve and boost muscle and skeleton strength from head to toe

Plan D Abdomen and Obliques
A comprehensive suite of workouts that can be employed to strengthen core muscles

Monday : Upper-body strength training (45 to 60 minutes) Tuesday: Lower-body strength training (30 to 60 minutes) Wednesday: Yoga or a low-impact activity such as barre, light cycling, or swimming (30 to 60 minutes) Thursday: HIIT High Intensity Training (20 minutes) Friday: Total-body strength training (30 to 60 minutes) Saturday: Steady-state cardio (running or cycling for as long as feels comfortable for you) Sunday: Rest
